: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus Prime: I'm not real anxioous to take that chance either, 
however if we cant break through the failsafes, our program might be 
the only thing that could weaken them.

Rodimus moniters the actions of Yggdrasil, and sees that the 
failsafes were preventing him from working on her spark.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: Maybe, maybe not... I'm not very willing to make her 
die, 
> if you see what I mean. I'll try to isolate her spark first. If 
> anything happens after that, it won't be as bad. Just check if 
> everything is okay while I do it.
>

> working on the spark.
>
